wikitext.*:
'''Ring-finder''' was a title that [[Gandalf]] used of [[Bilbo Baggins]] in [[Rivendell]] during a conversation with [[Frodo Baggins]]. He called Frodo "the [[Ring-bearer]]" and added that Frodo is "the heir of Bilbo, the Ring-finder".<ref>{{FR|II1}}</ref>
